body_html:
@apaszke Yes, that sounds great. It could also be removed from ATen/native, as this implementation is broken as @fmassa mentioned.

@apaszke Checking a bit more carefully it seems that vision only contains datasets, models and transforms, and no operations. In this sense it should be treated the same way as F.grid_sample, as is it in fact similar.
body_text:
@apaszke Yes, that sounds great. It could also be removed from ATen/native, as this implementation is broken as @fmassa mentioned.
@apaszke Checking a bit more carefully it seems that vision only contains datasets, models and transforms, and no operations. In this sense it should be treated the same way as F.grid_sample, as is it in fact similar.
body:
~~@apaszke Yes, that sounds great. It could also be removed from [ATen/native](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/tree/master/aten/src/ATen/native), as this implementation is broken as @fmassa mentioned.~~

@apaszke Checking a bit more carefully it seems that vision only contains datasets, models and transforms, and no operations. In this sense it should be treated the same way as F.grid_sample, as is it in fact similar.
